name: RMBL 1.0
description:
This is my first full game where I created from the ground up. All maps,  jobs, and story is my original creation. I use mostly basic assets and many of Visustella's core plugins (https://visustellamz.itch.io/) to help bring more quality of life functions to the game.

RMBL: Rumble on the Block
A game where you play as new kid that just moved to the suburbs of a big city. Your school is the lowest ranked school in the district. Your purpose is to gain strength and help build your school reputation through good ol' fashion, anime-style combat. 

Features:

-Choose between 6 different archetypes and self-assign your attributes to help compete against the other schools!

-Use various ARMs to enhance your combat capabilities!

-Explore a huge city map with dangers around every corner!

P.S.

As this is my first full game there will be updates to it as I complete more on my free time. I am very fond and enjoy making this game and have an overall plan for it, but as I am handling all of this on my own it will take time, but I hope you enjoy what I provide so far.
